website_summaries.verdict: Bulky yet lightweight, this revered product delights amateurs and pros alike. It's the best available.
pros: Range is 100 to 165 feet, depending on mode and other tools used
cons: Does not function as well in outdoor light

customer_reviews.title: Life changing..
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, you need it. Make sure you get the green laser version. Tested it out in a very bright room and you can see the line very well no problems. I wasnt sure if this came with a hard case but it does. Very happy with it. The hard case includes a pair of green glasses so you don't go blind, a charger and a battery. I would also recommend you get the tripod accesory.
customer_reviews.author: John August

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light
customer_reviews.text: Love the desalt recharging capabilities. Green line is much brighter than the red Bosch I have. It is a little bit thicker, but that just takes a little getting used to. Used it to redo my brothers balusters, handrails, and post on second fl0or. 6 Posts, 296 baluster. Also used it for by buddies laundry room make over to mount cabinets and set drill holes for all hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes every leveling project easier
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved laser line levels. The new green lines are great (though I was perfectly happy with red). This unit comes with a rechargeable battery, which seems to last longer and is easier than carrying batteries, however it is considerably heavier than the old model and so doesn't "stick" quite as well to an outside wall corner. That said, it still sticks and It's SO NICE to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Alligood

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old rotating laser that failed. This is the third laser level I have owned for cabinet installation. The green line is unbelievably bright. The pendulum leveling system seems completely reliable and repeatable. The off switch locks the pendulum, which is important for transport. The laser projects slightly less than 180 degrees, but the swiveling base allows for accurate repositioning in a full circle. Every part of this unit has a quality feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kirkyd123

customer_reviews.title: Pew pew
customer_reviews.text: Badass laser....super bright comparing it to the traditional red laser. Battery pack much more convenient then AA batteries. Only flaw is it only comes with one battery. But I rarely use mine but if you layout allot it could become a problem.
customer_reviews.author: dvs-SS

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as described, packaged well for shipment and arrived in a timely manner. Should have gotten one of these years ago. So easy to use and make any project move much quicker. Restoring a 100+ year old barn that has shifted and settled over the years this is so easy to set up and work off of the laser lines. A must have for any weekend handyman or professional
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A. Eick

customer_reviews.title: Definate buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I am colorblind and couldn't see the red laser in a bright lit room. Best laser ever made. Not just because I can see it better but because it's been dropped a few times and is still true and since I use Dewalt screwguns the rechargeable battery is convenient. I love turning it on every time. I install cabinets for a living so I use it everywhere every day, like I cant live without it.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Green is better than red
customer_reviews.text: I’m a DeWalt guy do i has to buy the brand. The green light is definitely better than the red which is why i purchased this laser. I stuck with a brand I’m loyal to despite feeling it’s overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: ihsan

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: This my first laser level and I love it.I like the green laser better than the red ones I have seen on job sites.I have been a carpenter for 30 years and this is one tool that makes my job MUCH easier,wish they were around when I started out in the trade!
customer_reviews.author: Chopperdawg Motorcycles

customer_reviews.title: which is nice a lot heavier and bulkier
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased the red laser but upgraded to the green after a couple jobs. The red was hard to see at a shorter distance than was stated in the specs. This unit is much brighter, but with the rechargeable battery, which is nice a lot heavier and bulkier. Had some issues with it sliding sideways on some drywall corners where the lighter red laser would not move. Seems to be very accurate I have checked the work with a level and it is right on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Subick

customer_reviews.title: never looked back
customer_reviews.text: it was a leap of faith for me to spend this much on a laser level but for me its been a game changer, its probably earned me back most of the cost in saved time and efforts, inside its unbeatable, outside in bright sun found it a challenge after 20' but is possible. i repeat that inside its so handy i grab it to even put up a shelf but constructed racking and lighting using this. case very good, i treated myself to the cheaper dewalt tripod and my life got even easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ad

customer_reviews.title: Product was not as listed.
customer_reviews.text: Product was purchased as "used" and in like new condition. It was deffinitely used as it only workes one time on a set of batteries. It comes on when a new set is installed and then overnight it drains the batteries and it does not work anymore unless you install new batteries. I suspect this is the reason it was returned before and resold but I don't have any proof. I am trying at this time to get a replacement. We will see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: POS BROKE IN FIRST 5 MINS OF USE
customer_reviews.text: POS!! SAVE YOUR TIME AND MONEY AND LOOK ELSEWHERE!! DEWALT IS EITHER LOWERING THEIR STANDARDS ON THE QUALITY ON THEIR PRODUCTS OR THIS IS A KNOCKOFF!! RETURNING THIS POS!
customer_reviews.author: BIG Z

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. The only problem is that the green laser light beam does not carry very far, especially if you're using it outside during the day. I used it to lay out a 24'x48' barn and I found it worked best if I waited until dusk when the sun was down but there was still enough light to work by. For the money, it's one of the best units on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: works perfect
customer_reviews.text: simple and effective Update 2/17/2020: I bought the Dewalt tripod to go with the laser and can tell you the kit is a huge time saver. Makes cutting outlets, running a screw line on sheetrock, installing studs, wall sconces, etc. monumentally easier. My chalk line is not happy with me.
customer_reviews.author: Nosler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool!
customer_reviews.text: I installed my own pool, and retainer wall with this. Both came out perfectly level! I shot the laser at night, and it lights up the whole backyard. Harder in day to pick up on the laser, but still possible to see.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: we keep finding more reasons to use this tool
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a bathroom remodel and tile project. Now i'm using it all the time. Love this tool. VERY helpful, for so many DIY tasks and even something as simple as wall-mounting a hanger or shelf.
customer_reviews.author: KLash

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the truck. Buy the 12v battery and it charges over lunch and lasts for days. Only wish i bought the green laser for a few buck more. Super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: details13

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Had for 2 months, Unit BROKEN. Battery no longer shows power, nothing lights up at all. Tried multiple brand new batteries. NOTHING. DEAD. $400 paperweight 1 month outside "return window" per amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Troco

customer_reviews.title: Green line weak outside in daylight. Inside a building it's great.
customer_reviews.text: Take note you must place this laser on a near level service to begin with, there is only a little swing left to right and back and forth to allow for true adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Todd K.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This unit is worth every penny I spent on it. It works like magic. I’m not contractor or anything like that. I just use at home. I saved about 90% of my time using this DeWalt laser level.
customer_reviews.author: TEXAS AUTO

customer_reviews.title: Not DeWalt quality
customer_reviews.text: Battery died after less than a year. Laser worked as expected but the smaller batteries should survive more than 2 charges. This tool was not used for more than an hour total.
customer_reviews.author: David Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great at home too for hanging pictures level
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He uses it frequently as he is a Carpenter and has many uses for it at work. Great at home too for hanging pictures level.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Cutone

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is average at best
customer_reviews.text: I've used many different brands of line lasers and this one has the widest line width at 50ft I've used. It works, but not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Hard To Impress

customer_reviews.title: Wanted more bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Laser works fine overall. Even though it's green, the laser is hard to see outdoors after about 8 feet. You'll want a laser receiver/ detector past that distance. The price could be lower and the manual could have more information in it. The laser turns off when locked. I just expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Juan D.

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The best in lazers that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laser for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laser for the price. Many of the other trades ask where to get it, and how much on the sites we work. Having a recharged battery always available is worth it's weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: David Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use great product
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness I love this product. Bought it for my husband which he has used many times. I have used it to hang pictures. It’s so easy using this. Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Lovette

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: The locking feature is great! Sets the pendulum in a lock state so that when the tool is moved around from one location to another, the fragile parts will not be bouncing around jeopardizing the efficiency of this awesome tool. Also compatible with new rechargeable dealt 12v batteries
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Great laser. Super bright. Line is not overly thick. Visible even in direct sunlight. Magnets are extremely useful. Battery life is amazing. Used for about 4 hours today and battery was still showing full charge. Best money I have spent on a tool in years!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine J. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. And shots a line across very long distances before fading out. This one is really made for ceiling grid though.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: The whole world is going green!
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Decided to grab one after my company issued me a laser that was not set properly. Worked out great and have better clarity with it in more illuminated areas.
customer_reviews.author: rico

customer_reviews.title: red lazer is kinda hard to see
customer_reviews.text: works great. use it for electrical and for framing and lineing up walls. I would go for the green lazer.. more expensive but is easier to see . All my tools are dewalt almost any tool of dewalts i have it. dewalt sells a grwat product and has good warrantys for there tools.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Incredible bright laser line and much more pleasant than the red.
customer_reviews.author: Bob The Builder

customer_reviews.title: Great investment.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, as expected from Dewalt. I use this thing all the time. Battery lasts forever. A huge upgrade over a red line laser.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Wall Stripes
customer_reviews.text: I am going to use it for painting stripes on a bedroom wall. Looks like it will work great!
customer_reviews.author: Adam W. Olig

customer_reviews.title: very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Used it for building several projects. tested it against 4' level. was always dead on
customer_reviews.author: honey extractor

customer_reviews.title: the self leveling is very forgiving
customer_reviews.text: great product, have not used it outside but in a building with daylight cieling panels and it worked great. strong magnet, nice controls. great storage case .
customer_reviews.author: Tina Dennett

customer_reviews.title: A truly wonderful tool for all your interior works.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect tool for all your needs. I am a glass installer and this laser line gives me the perfect line everytime. Good for my drywall partition, and all other interior works. Can't remember how I did work without a laser.
customer_reviews.author: Huzaifa Hameed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: I'm a union carpenter in NYC and we re always working up against the floor to cieling windows and when the sun is blaring in you can still see the line. Unfortunately it is very expensive and very likely to grow feet and walk away. I had mine about two weeks blinked once and it was gone. That was six months ago and as you can probably tell I'm not over it.
customer_reviews.author: Lance K. Woodbury

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: green laser has better visibility in sunlight, lines do not bleed out as much in distance
customer_reviews.author: Randall W Lipschultz

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully. Makes installing large sliding glass doors MUCH easier ...
customer_reviews.text: Do windows and sliding glass doors. Works beautifully. Makes installing large sliding glass doors MUCH easier and faster. Bye bye plumb bomb.
customer_reviews.author: Stogie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bright!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright and easy to see even in daylight!! Well worth the extra $ you spend verses the older red beam version. Also I'm impressed with how long the battery lasts on this thing, can go a whole day easy with heavy use and still be good to go! Recharges in under half an hour. The hard case it comes in is nice but wish it was a little less bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Sheetmetalworker89

customer_reviews.title: Best Tool Investment
customer_reviews.text: Cuts down the time spent installing cabinets immensely and allows us to show clients when their existing floors, walls, ceilings etc. aren't straight/level easily.
customer_reviews.author: RJMom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. The guys on his crews all have one now.
customer_reviews.author: sjb Brit

customer_reviews.title: not a 360 degree Level
customer_reviews.text: Use it for laying up tile Backsplash in Kitchen. Worked as expected and made the job easy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bradish

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool! Green lazer is the way to go. Shows up great. Use for many applications but mainly cabinet and tile installs.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to read in brighter situations than red lasers.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: It looks great so far
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered and received this DeWalt green line laser . . . . . It looks great so far . . . . Not quite as bright outdoors as I was led to believe but far superior to any red laser I've used. (I am a light construction professional, houses, etc..) . . . . . I tried to register the tool on-lIne and by telephone . . . . and so far the DeWalt service center . . . . . IS TOTAL CRAP . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my overall purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my overall purchase. I have a lot of dewalt tools and have come to expect a quality tool. This laser stands up to my expectations and is very bright even in daylight..
customer_reviews.author: James Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt is the Best
customer_reviews.text: Really loving this Dewalt laser. Makes all your work precise and accurate. Invest in yourself and get this laser level or the Dewalt 360.
customer_reviews.author: Brent H.

customer_reviews.title: recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations and got it in time no delays great product and perfect to the type of my job
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Not visible in bright sunlight
customer_reviews.text: You can not see the line in the bright sunlight as mentioned in previous reviews. You can see the line about 25-30 feet at dusk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time saver.
customer_reviews.text: A life saver. I layed out ceilings, and LF wall tile with grater greater accuracy then before.
customer_reviews.author: larry robinson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding laser.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool for the jobsite. We are used to using green lasers for outside work and this unit didn't disappoint. Usable laser in exterior applications. Indoor brighteness is excellent. Lines are sharp. Plumb and level dead on at 30' when checked with 4' bubble levels. I'm an electrician and this tool makes it so fast and easy to mark my knockout locations between gear, installing strut for conduit supports on walls, ceilings and even around corners. Small arms light means it's easy to grab and deploy. Magnets are incredibly strong.
customer_reviews.author: troyw

customer_reviews.title: A must have tool!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lazer!!!!!! I also own the red lazer and the green blows the doors off the red one. It's a must have tool if your in construction.

customer_reviews.text: I been using my new laser for the last couple days and I love it thank you

customer_reviews.text: Great laser with very strong light. Rechargeable battery makes it a must have.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice laser very bright. Wish the bracket was removable and magnet could be a little stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for inside work
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for inside work, love it . But outside ,beam is lost in about 3 to 5 ft. Need something with more POWER for outside .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was told green was much better so I gave it a try
customer_reviews.text: We use lasers for work everyday! Have been using Bosch red line laser for the past 3 years. I was told green was much better so I gave it a try. This laser has it all over the red Bosch in every way! Trust me you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Good Laser.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality i have been working with lasers for 7 years and this is one of the best product so far Simple desing with great idea of what you need Specially in my kinda of Job. But still thinking the box is to Big.

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt does it again.  Great product at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to see, even in pretty bright sunlight. I love the rechargeable battery. If you don't feel like spending a fortune for a Hilti, get this instead. The green is better than the red, that tends to wash out in sunlight. The case is pretty oversized but functions well to protect your investment.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how it works but my husband was happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how it works but my husband was happy with this product. i know he is a big Dewalt fan.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. If you have the extra cash, consider the higher model. Can’t use this outside unless it’s night time. Not sure that this item is considerably better then other lasers in the 50 dollar range.

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: I swear by these lasers. Had every model cross line self leveling laser they make. They are durable and last. The new green one is hands down the most powerful one I've seen yet and hands down worth the bucks if you take care of your tools. From framing walls to installing cabinets this tool is your best allie. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Everyone doing handy work needs one of these
customer_reviews.text: I have use this thing inside and outside. It's not great outside during the day, but it's about as good as you're going to find.

customer_reviews.text: We use it to line up and level cabinets. It's been great so far. I just wish it came with a rechargeable battery instead of a pack that holds AA batteries.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Unit is what I wanted , works great. The shipping was done at the deadline they gave me, it took seven days to ship 100 miles thought it was little slow for no further than it had to go.

customer_reviews.title: Missing one battery
customer_reviews.text: Laser is great, good quality ,only one thing missing,second battery

customer_reviews.title: Good tool to work not bad for bright areas just ...
customer_reviews.text: Good tool to work not bad for bright areas just be careful bc is a easier tool to break (drops,or accidental throws). Highly recommended ... !! Pd.- The red color don't come with battery 12 volts
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Lopez Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Great laser
customer_reviews.text: This laser is the brightest I have used, the rechargeable battery is long lasting, I have been able to get 24 hours out of the battery and still have charge left. The only time I got a faint double line was when it reflected back off a window, at 100 feet this laser is perfectly level. It also includes a backing plate when using it on light gauge metal studs, a real plus for framing soffits. The only complaint I have is the charger is the DW107 which is the slowest charger DeWalt makes for the max batteries. Purchasing another battery is a must if you don't have time to wait 90 minutes for the battery to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S

customer_reviews.title: I love it but doe that much money it should cast ...

product_meta.title: DEWALT (DW088LG) 12V MAX Line Laser, Cross Line, Green
product_meta.description: Style:12V Green Line LaserThe DEWALT DW088LG 12v Green Cross Line Laser is part of the 12V lithium ion rechargeable power tool battery platform. This line laser is designed for extra long run time and the convenience of rechargeable power tool batteries. It features self leveling cross lines that projects bright crossing horizontal and vertical lines for various leveling and layout applications. It also features an integrated magnetic bracket; rear mounted magnets allow flush attachment to metal track and steel. It has a full time pulse mode that allows for use with detector, over molded housing and IP65 water/debris resistance, a locking pendulum to help prevent damage to internal components. Includes: Blow Mold Case, Extended Ceiling Bracket , 12 v Battery, Charger , Green Cross Line Laser, Target Card, and Enhancement glasses. This is a Class 2 laser product, Power output ≤ 1.5mW.
feature_bullets: Self leveling cross Lines that projects bright crossing horizontal and vertical Lines
Green beam laser Technology which is four times brighter than red

Integrated magnetic bracket allows for flush attachment to metal track and steel; Integrated magnetic bracket with 1/4” and 5/8” thread rear mounted magnets allow flush attachment to metal and steel track
over molded housing and IP65 Water/debris resistance
Part of the 12V Lithium ion Rechargeable Power tool Battery platform

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars400 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
